name: Angels of Darkness Angels of Light
name_original: Angels of Darkness Angels of Light
description:
Play as either an angel of Darkness or an Angel of Light. A war between Angels from the distant past is reimagined in a Medieval Mindset. Rival factions battle it out in an attempt to commit iconoclast against each other. The choice is yours which side you affiliate with.
Each side has a choice of six Angel classes and one human servant class.
Each class having it's own strengths and weaknesses.
There is also the choice of having bots or no bots in the game
Primary weapon and secondary weapon/ability for each class
Kick System built in
Text Chat (Global or Team)
Unique and specially written soundtrack for this title and three sister games
Male and female protagonists
Medieval and Classical environments
Ten levels and more to be added
Regular updates planned.
